Properties.Caption: Просмотр описания операций
Properties.Tag: Select [K_TB].[CTB] As [Тип бюджета], Rtrim([K_EX_OP].[CEX_OP]) As [Операция проводки], Max([K_EX_OP].[NEX_OP]) As [Наименование операции проводки], [K_BS].[CBS] As [Балансовый счет], Max([K_BS].[NBS]) As [Наименование бал счета], [K_TD].[CTD] As [Тип документа], Max([K_TD].[NTD]) As [Наименование типа документа], Case When [K_OP_DESC].[DT_CT]=1 Then 'Д' Else 'К' End As [ДК], [K_OP_DESC].[NUM] As [Номер], [K_CHDCO].[CCHDCO] As [Тип фиксации событий], Max([K_CHDCO].[NCHDCO]) As [Наименование типа событий], Sgn([K_OP_DESC].[FLAGS] & 16) As [Баланс бюджета], Sgn([K_OP_DESC].[FLAGS] & 8) As [Баланс казначейства], Sgn([K_OP_DESC].[FLAGS] & 4) As [Баланс учреждения] From ((((((([K_EX_OP] With (NoLock) Inner Join [K_OP_DESC] With (NoLock) On ([K_EX_OP].[K_EX_OPID]=[K_OP_DESC].[K_EX_OPID])) Inner Join [K_BS] With (NoLock) On ([K_OP_DESC].[K_BSID]=[K_BS].[K_BSID])) Left Join [K_TD_K_EX_OP] With (NoLock) On ([K_EX_OP].[K_EX_OPID]=[K_TD_K_EX_OP].[K_EX_OPID])) Left Join [K_TD] With (NoLock) On ([K_TD_K_EX_OP].[K_TDID]=[K_TD].[K_TDID])) Left Join [K_CHDCO_K_EX_OP] With (NoLock) On ([K_EX_OP].[K_EX_OPID]=[K_CHDCO_K_EX_OP].[K_EX_OPID])) Left Join [K_CHDCO] With (NoLock) On ([K_CHDCO_K_EX_OP].[K_CHDCOID]=[K_CHDCO].[K_CHDCOID])) Inner Join [K_TB] With (NoLock) On ([K_EX_OP].[K_TBID]=[K_TB].[K_TBID])) Where |0 Group by [K_TB].[CTB], Rtrim([K_EX_OP].[CEX_OP]), [K_BS].[CBS], [K_TD].[CTD], Case When [K_OP_DESC].[DT_CT]=1 Then 'Д' Else 'К' End, [K_OP_DESC].[NUM], [K_CHDCO].[CCHDCO], Sgn([K_OP_DESC].[FLAGS] & 16), Sgn([K_OP_DESC].[FLAGS] & 8), Sgn([K_OP_DESC].[FLAGS] & 4) Order by |1
Properties.Name: Просмотр описания операций
